definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Menisci can be easily torn with sharp, rapid motions.
sentences.chinese: 半月板撕裂，可以很容易用锋利的快速运动。

sentences.english: What is the function of the knee menisci?
sentences.chinese: 膝盖半月板的功能是什么？

sentences.english: Allogenic medial menisci implantation were done in group A.
sentences.chinese: 组进行同种异体内侧半月板移植。

sentences.english: The sweeny after my meniscus operation is fierce, how should exercise ability to restore?
sentences.chinese: 我半月板手术后肌肉萎缩厉害，要怎么锻炼才能恢复？

sentences.english: Knee-joint peels the take off nature bone chondritis and meniscus loss and cyst.
sentences.chinese: 膝关节剥脱性骨软骨炎与半月板损伤并囊肿。

sentences.english: Is meniscus of the side outside genu torn off how Mo cure?
sentences.chinese: 膝外侧半月板撕裂怎么治疗？

sentences.english: To investigate the clinic effect of arthroscopic meniscectomy on therapy of meniscus injury. 60 patients with meniscus injury treated with arthroscopic meniscectomy were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨膝关节镜手术治疗半月板损伤的临床疗效。

sentences.english: MILAN - A. C. Milan communicates that the footballer Marco Borriello was subjected to an operation to his right knee today to remove a meniscus flap.
sentences.chinese: 米兰对外宣布，博列诺的右膝盖半月板手术已经成功。

sentences.english: The meniscal injuries are the most common reason of the knee joint disorder.
sentences.chinese: 半月板损伤是膝关节紊乱最常见的原因之一。

sentences.english: Conclusion The semilunar plates is viscoelasticity body.
sentences.chinese: 结论半月板为粘弹性体。

sentences.english: The changes of the partial meniscus with sclerosis denaturalization were observed in tissue section.
sentences.chinese: 组织切片观察半月板硬结变性部分的组织学变化。

sentences.english: The diagnosis of 6 anterior cruciate ligamentum and 5 meniscus injuries were missed.
sentences.chinese: 术前漏诊前交叉韧带损伤6例，半月板损伤5例。

sentences.english: The orthopaedic doctor says that my meniscus has some problems.
sentences.chinese: 骨科医生说，我的半月板有问题。

sentences.english: What does seeper appear to should notice after meniscus operation?
sentences.chinese: 半月板手术后出现积水应注意什么？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the MRI manifestation of discoid meniscus and the diagnosis criteria of MRI.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨盘状半月板及损伤的MRI表现及诊断标准。

sentences.english: The posterior horn of the medial meniscus was avulsed from its insertion and knees were retested.
sentences.chinese: 内侧半月板后角从插入点撕脱，重新测量膝关节。

definition: articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
to suffer a fracture/(of a bone) to break/fracture
